Name: Lust of the Apartment Wives
About the game: A small apartment complex...The type that might exist anywhere... Our main character is a grocery deliveryman who's polite demeanor and pleasant smile have earned him a bit of celebrity status around the complex. But his smile is not as innocent as it seems... He has an ulterior motive...Sampling some of these finely aged apartment wives! Kaori, positively overflowing with mature sexuality. Ryoko, plain to look at but with a hidden lust bubbling under the surface. And Mayumi, still nursing her newborn child and with a chest that makes our hero weak. Their husbands can no longer satisfy them, so now it's up to you! The following features are included: - Full voice for female characters only - CG / Event Scene / Music Listening Mode - Automatic Play Mode
